mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (goods_id, goods_name, quantity, buyer, address, phone, pay_date) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{quantity}, #{buyer}, #{address}, #{phone}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS orderId, goods_id AS goodsId, goods_name AS goodsName, quantity AS quantity, buyer AS buyer, address AS address, phone AS phone, pay_date AS payDate FROM orders ORDER BY order_id ASC
